original_text: Then Jesus began to denounce the towns in which most of his miracles had been performed, because they did not repent.
korean_text: 예수께서 권능을 가장 많이 행하신 고을들이 회개하지 아니하므로 그 때에 책망하시되

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus began to denounce towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 여러 도시들을 비난하기 시작하셨다

sentences.original_text: in which most of his miracles had been performed
